text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Call of Duty: Warzone, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-7746 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The fan noise is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-7746 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The screen brightness is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Avoid the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-7746 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the battery life on the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-7746 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Starfield, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-7746 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The port selection is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
